00052 #define RtnArgCount() EnvRtnArgCount(GetCurrentEnvironment())
00053 #define ArgCountCheck(a,b,c) EnvArgCountCheck(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a,b,c)
00054 #define ArgRangeCheck(a,b,c) EnvArgRangeCheck(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a,b,c)
00055 #define RtnLexeme(a) EnvRtnLexeme(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a)
00056 #define RtnDouble(a) EnvRtnDouble(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a)
00057 #define RtnLong(a) EnvRtnLong(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a)
00058 #define RtnUnknown(a,b) EnvRtnUnknown(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a,b)
00059 #define ArgTypeCheck(a,b,c,d) EnvArgTypeCheck(GetCurrentEnvironment(),a,b,c,d)
